name: War! (Andrew Harrison)
overview: WAR! Version 1.0 - By Andrew Harrison, a 2-4 player tank combat game. Simply blast the hell out of your mates tanks with the weapons available to you. There are two power-ups available in the game. The shield icon restores a random amount of your shields energy while the power icon increases your tanks selected weapon ammo supply. The four green bars next to your tanks window show how much ammo you have.
